Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "flickoff:block"
X[S] You \{flick\|flutter\|swish\} your \{arm\|elbow\|eyebrow\|foot\}, blocking and thwacking \$(opponent) simultaneously.
X[S] \$(attacker) \{flicks\|flutters\|swishes\} \$(attacker-objective) \{arm\|elbow\|eyebrow\|foot\}, blocking and thwacking \$(opponent) simultaneously.
X[S] \$(attacker) \{flicks\|flutters\|swishes\} \$(attacker-objective) \{arm\|elbow\|eyebrow\|foot\}, blocking and thwacking you simultaneously.

X[S] You \{swackle\|swish\|swing\} your \{arm\|head\|knee\|toe\|foot\|feet\} in a defensive \{flutter\|flick\|arc\|twist\}, blocking \$(opponent)'s feeble attempts to wound you, wounding \$(opponent-objective) instead!

X[S] \$(attacker) \{swackles\|swishes\|swings\} \$(attacker-possessive) \{arm\|head\|knee\|toe\|foot\|feet\} in a defensive \{flutter\|flick\|arc\|twist\}, blocking \$(opponent)'s feeble attempt to wound \$(attacker-objective), wounding \$(opponent-objective) instead!

X[S] \$(attacker) \{swackles\|swishes\|swings\} \$(attacker-possessive) \{arm\|head\|knee\|toe\|foot\|feet\} in a defensive \{flutter\|flick\|arc\|twist\}, blocking your feeble attempt to wound \$(attacker-objective), wounding you instead!
X[S] You \{stumble whilst\|fail in\|miss when\} attacking \$(opponent).
X[S] \$(attacker) \{stumbles whilst\|fails in\|misses when\} attacking \$(opponent).
X[S] \$(attacker) \{stumbles whilst\|fails in\|misses when\} attacking you.
X[S] You \{bounce\|wiggle\|jump\|flip\} \{up in\|into\|to\} the air, slapping \$(opponent) over the head.
X[S] \$(attacker) \{bounces\|wiggles\|jumps\|flips\} \{up in\|into\|to\} the air, slapping \$(opponent) over the head.
X[S] \$(attacker) \{bounces\|wiggles\|jumps\|flips\} \{up in\|into\|to\} the air, slapping you over the head.
X[S] You slap \$(opponent) soundly over the head, drawing blood in this \{mighty\|heavy\|bone-breaking\} thwap!
X[S] \$(attacker) slaps \$(opponent) soundly over the head, drawing blood in this \{mighty\|heavy\|bone-breaking\} thwap!
X[S] \$(attacker) slaps you soundly over the head, drawing blood in this \{mighty\|heavy\|bone-breaking\} thwap!
X[S] You \{tackle\|pounce on\|wreck into\} \$(opponent)'s \{belly\|face\|chest\|side\} with a \{loud\|heavy\|bone-breaking\|tumbling\} tackle.
X[S] \$(attacker) \{tackles\|pounces on\|wrecks into\} \$(opponent)'s \{belly\|face\|chest\|side\} with a \{loud\|heavy\|bone-breaking\|tumbling\} tackle.
X[S] \$(attacker) \{tackles\|pounces on\|wrecks into\} your \{belly\|face\|chest\|side\} with a \{loud\|heavy\|bone-breaking\|tumbling\} tackle.
X[S] You tackle \$(opponent) \{soundly\|square\|right\|smack\} in the \{belly\|nose\|head\|face\|torso\|chest\|side\}, knocking \$(opponent-objective) off \$(opponent-possessive) feet.
X[S] \$(attacker) tackles \$(opponent) \{soundly\|square\|right\|smack\} in the \{belly\|nose\|head\|face\|torso\|chest\|side\}, knocking \$(opponent-objective) off \$(opponent-possessive) feet.
X[S] \$(attacker) tackles you \{soundly\|square\|right\|smack\} in the \{belly\|nose\|head\|face\|torso\|chest\|side\}, knocking you off your feet.
([ "+block":"flickoff:block", "+slap":"flickoff:slap", "+tackle":"flickoff:tackle" ])
